--- title: "Palmer penguins" author: "ì‹ íƒœì„ ,ì‹ ì¸ì² ,ì‹ ì§€ì› ğŸ§ğŸ§ğŸ§" date: "2025-03-06" categories: [news, code, analysis] image: "image.jpg" format: html jupyter: python3 --- # Palmerpenguins Data Analysis ## ë¬¸ì œ : ê° í­ê·„ ì¢…ë³„ íŠ¹ì§• ì•Œì•„ë‚´ê¸°. - ë°ì´í„° ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ::: {#87af8dd3 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd from palmerpenguins import load_penguins penguins = load_penguins() penguins.info() df=penguins # í¸ì˜ìƒ df ë³€ìˆ˜ ì‚¬ìš©. ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` RangeIndex: 344 entries, 0 to 343 Data columns (total 8 columns): # Column Non-Null Count Dtype --- ------ -------------- ----- 0 species 344 non-null object 1 island 344 non-null object 2 bill_length_mm 342 non-null float64 3 bill_depth_mm 342 non-null float64 4 flipper_length_mm 342 non-null float64 5 body_mass_g 342 non-null float64 6 sex 333 non-null object 7 year 344 non-null int64 dtypes: float64(4), int64(1), object(3) memory usage: 21.6+ KB ``` ::: ::: - ë°ì´í„° ë¶„ì„ì„ ìœ„í•´ `df` ì— ì–´ë–¤ ë°ì´í„°ê°€ ìˆëŠ”ì§€ í™•ì¸í•œë‹¤. ::: {#7b120d42 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ```{=html}

bill length = ë¶€ë¦¬ì˜ê¸¸ì´ bill depth = ë¶€ë¦¬ ê¹Šì´ ## í­ê·„ ì„±ë³„ì— ë”°ë¼ ê°œì²´ìˆ˜ êµ¬í•˜ê¸° ::: {#d37b0aa0 .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} nan_penguins = penguins['sex'].isna().sum() female_adelie = penguins.loc[(penguins['species'] == 'Adelie') & (penguins['sex']=="female")].shape[0] male_adelie = penguins.loc[(penguins['species'] == 'Adelie') & (penguins['sex']=="male")].shape[0] female_gentoo = penguins.loc[(penguins['species'] == 'Gentoo') & (penguins['sex']=="female")].shape[0] male_gentoo = penguins.loc[(penguins['species'] == 'Gentoo') & (penguins['sex']=="male")].shape[0] female_chinstrap = penguins.loc[(penguins['species'] == 'Chinstrap') & (penguins['sex']=="female")].shape[0] male_chinstrap = penguins.loc[(penguins['species'] == 'Chinstrap') & (penguins['sex']=="male")].shape[0] ``` ::: ##
